text: "Mungu ibariki Afrika" (; ; "God bless Africa") is the national anthem of Tanzania. It has the same tune as "Nkosi Sikelel' iAfrika". ==Lyrics== Swahili lyrics IPA transcription English translation I God bless Africa Bless its leaders Wisdom, unity and peace These are our shields Africa and its people. Bless Africa, Bless Africa Bless us, the children of Africa. II God bless Tanzania Grant eternal freedom and unity To its women, men and children God bless Tanzania and its people. Bless Tanzania, Bless Tanzania Bless us, the children of Tanzania. ==References== Category:African anthems Category:National symbols of Tanzania
title: Mungu ibariki Afrika
